page.title: 13MARTON HALL
page.content: This is a private school in a large old house. The grounds are made up of 45 acres of grass and trees. There is a pond which is a kettle hole, known also as a marton from which the school derives its name. When we went inside the school we saw the classroom and dormitories. The classrooms were very old fashioned. The children sit in desks in rows facing the teacher who is on a raised platform. Teaching is subject based and includes mathematics, English, French, geography, history, chemistry, physics, biology, RE, art, PE and games. There are 5 classes of 10 children of which 12 are girls. The dormitories have bunk beds with quilts. There are about 10 children in each room. The children say the food is very good. There is a heated swimming pool. The age range is 6-14.
